newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkish market seen short ahead of weekend.
newsitem.headline: Turkish market seen short ahead of weekend.

text.p: 0625 gmt - Turkish market is likely to be short on Friday. Net cash outflow of 49.4 trln lira is expected.
*Weekend fresh cash demand and corporate tax payments will aggravate cash squeeze, bankers said.
*Banks' dollar bids in the morning are at around 160,080 lira.
*No deal was done in the central bank-brokered currency market on Thursday.
